parameter.name: serialPortOrIP
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Serial port of the modem, or the IP address if it is a network one.

parameter.name: baudOrNetworkPort
parameter.label: Baud Or Network Port
parameter.description: Baud rate, in case of a serial modem, or network port if it is on another machine.

parameter.name: simPin
parameter.label: Pin Code
parameter.description: The pin (if set) for the sim card.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.description: Delay between polling for new messages (in seconds).

parameter.name: delayBetweenSend
parameter.description: Delay between two messages (in milliseconds). Useful for slow modem.

channel-type.label: Message Received
channel-type.description: Triggered when a message is received, in the form "<msisdn_sender>|<text>"
